info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued June 22 at 4:46PM MDT until June 22 at 7:45PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque NM
info.description:
FFWABQ
The National Weather Service in Albuquerque has issued a
* Flash Flood Warning for... Central Chaves County in southeastern New Mexico...
* Until 745 PM MDT.
* At 446 PM MDT, Radar data supports heavy rainfall and trained weather spotters reported thunderstorms producing heavy rain and flooding occurring on multiple roads in the Roswell area - West Pine Lodge, Brown Road at Berrendo River. Roads impassable. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. The expected rainfall rate is 1 to 2 inches in 1 hour. Flash flooding is already occurring.
HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding.
SOURCE...Trained spotters reported.
IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses.
* Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Roswell and Bitter Lake Wildlife Refuge.
This includes the following highways... Highway 380 between Mile Markers 156 and 166. Highway 285 between Mile Markers 103 and 131.
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
Do not drive your vehicle into areas where water covers the roadway. The water depth may be too great to allow your car to cross safely.

parameter.value: NWS: FLASH FLOOD WARNING this area til 7:45 PM MDT. Avoid flooded areas.

National Weather Service: A FLASH FLOOD WARNING is in effect for this area until 7:45 PM MDT. This is a dangerous and life-threatening situation. Do not attempt to travel unless you are fleeing an area subject to flooding or under an evacuation order.

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS hasta 7:45 PM MDT. Evite areas inundadas.

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS en efecto para esta area hasta las 7:45 PM MDT. Esta es una situacion peligrosa y amenaza la vida. No intente viajar a menos que sea para abandonar un area propensa a inundaciones o bajo una orden de desalojo.
